name: Cyber Hunter 2D
description:
This is my first 2D game made with Unity and C# for a University exam. It is a 2D sci-fi game, with platform style, for android where the player must make his way through the enemies using super powers to reach the level boss and beat him.

The game is made with free assets, with the limitation on using it to made different level. 

I would like to buy or create new assets that help me to create original level, different from each one, containing various types of enemies and bosses. I would like to improve the graphic quality and make the game funny to play, enticing you to play every single level.

Thank you for your contribution!
